gemini_analysis.description: AI-powered tool automating web tasks from walkthrough videos.  Creates code-free automations.
gemini_analysis.pricing_info: Free plan, Apps plan ($29/month), Apps + Browser plan ($49/month). Lifetime deals mentioned.
gemini_analysis.special_offers: Lifetime deals, free plans, 70% off sign-up offers,  extra 10% discount via AppSumo deal, 88% off for a limited time via a special link
